Title: Elements Part 2: Bespoken For
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Somvilay Xayaphone, Seo Jung Kim, Kent Osborne (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Julia Pott (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Tom Kenny, Lauren Lapkus
Plot: The friends learn the story of what happened to Ooo, while Betty continues her attempt to reach Simon, but she's interrupted by someone out to steal her magic.
